item.title: Post-Quantum OpenMLS
item.description: OpenMLS now offers security against harvest-now-decrypt-later (HNDL) quantum adversaries. In #1546 we merged support for the X-Wing KEM draft, which is an early draft for securely combining elliptic-curve-based Diffie-Hellman with ML-KEM. In particular, OpenMLS now supports the ciphersuite MLS_256_XWING_CHACHA20POLY1305_SHA256_Ed25519 with ciphersuite 0x004D. There is no IANA code-point for this ciphersuite yet, such that interoperability may not be guaranteed. We work with other implementers towards interoperability of this ciphersuite. The implementation uses Cryspenâ€™s formally verified ML-KEM and x25519 implementations from libcrux.
